Rules.InvariantScript:
If(ThisItem.Y = 1 && ThisItem.X = 1, "[", "") & 
If(ThisItem.X = 1, "[", "") & 
Char(34) & ThisItem.Value & Char(34) & 
If(ThisItem.X = PixelDrawer.inpScreenWidth, "]",",") &
If(ThisItem.X = PixelDrawer.inpScreenWidth && ThisItem.Y = PixelDrawer.inpScreenHeight, "]",",")

ClearCollect(colDisplayData,
            ForAll(Sequence(PixelDrawer.inpScreenHeight) As colTmpRow,
                AddColumns(
                    RenameColumns(
                        Sequence(PixelDrawer.inpScreenWidth),
                        "Value",
                        "X"),
                    "Value",  Match(JSON(PixelDrawer.inpPaintColor, JSONFormat.IgnoreUnsupportedTypes),"[a-fA-F0-9]{6}").FullMatch,
                    "Y", colTmpRow.Value)))

CustomProperties.Name: inpPixelPadding
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The padding to be applied between pixels of the display

CustomProperties.Name: inpScreenColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The default background color of the display behind pixels

CustomProperties.Name: inpScreenHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The number of pixels making up the height of the display

CustomProperties.Name: inpScreenWidth
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The number of pixels making up the width of the display
